description: This traybake makes for a fantastic fakeaway dish served with rice or noodles.
name: Asian Inspired Sticky Chicken Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium carrots, peeled and sliced diagonally
1 medium green capsicum, cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chicken legs in a shallow dish and slash the skin with a knife. Mix the marinade ingredients in a small bowl then pour over the chicken. Cover with foil and marinade for at least 30 minutes.
Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place the orange wedges, spring onion, carrots and capsicum in a large roasting tray and pour over the chicken and any excess marinade.
Roast for 35 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through and sticky and the vegetables are soft.
Divide the vegetables between 4 plates ensuring each has an orange wedge for squeezing over. Top each with a sticky chicken leg and serve with rice, if desired.
